verses.verse: Now the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Tell<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> and <S%H2583>camp<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Pi-hahiroth, <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H4024>Migdol<s%> and the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> you shall <S%H2583>camp<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of Baal-zephon, <S%H5227>opposite<s%> it, by the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

"For <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> will <S%H559>say<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> 'They are <S%H943>wandering<s%> <S%H943>aimlessly<s%> in the <S%H776>land;<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> has <S%H5462>shut<s%> them in.'

"Thus I will <S%H2388>harden<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and he will <S%H7291>chase<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them; and I will be <S%H3513>honored<s%> through Pharaoh and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H2428>army,<s%> and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>" And they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so.<s%>

When the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> was <S%H5046>told<s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> had <S%H1272>fled,<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H2015>had<s%> a <S%H2015>change<s%> of <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> we have <S%H6213>done,<s%> that we have <S%H7971>let<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> from <S%H5647>serving<s%> us?"
So he <S%H631>made<s%> his <S%H7393>chariot<s%> <S%H631>ready<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> with him;

and he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H977>select<s%> <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the [other] <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with <S%H7991>officers<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2388>hardened<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and he <S%H7291>chased<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> as the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H3318>going<s%> out <S%H7311>boldly.<s%> <S%H3027><s%>

Then the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H7291>chased<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them [with] <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5483>horses<s%> [and] <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> his <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> and his <S%H2428>army,<s%> and they <S%H5381>overtook<s%> them <S%H2583>camping<s%> by the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> Pi-hahiroth, in <S%H6440>front<s%> of Baal-zephon.

And as <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7126>drew<s%> <S%H7126>near,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5375>looked,<s%> <S%H5869><s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> were <S%H5265>marching<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them, and they <S%H3372>became<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3372>frightened;<s%> so the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%> out to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

Then they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "Is it <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H1097><s%> <S%H369>there<s%> were <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H6913>graves<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> that you have <S%H3947>taken<s%> us away to <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>? <S%H4100>Why<s%> have you <S%H6213>dealt<s%> with us in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2088>way,<s%> <S%H3318>bringing<s%> us out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>?

"Is <S%H2088>this<s%> not the <S%H1697>word<s%> that we <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to you in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2308>'Leave<s%> us <S%H4480>alone<s%> that we may <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>'? For it would have been <S%H2896>better<s%> for us to <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> to <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>"

But <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> "Do not <S%H3372>fear!<s%> <S%H3320>Stand<s%> by and <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H3444>salvation<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He will <S%H6213>accomplish<s%> for you <S%H3117>today;<s%> for the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3117>today,<s%> you will <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5750><s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> them <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>
"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H3898>fight<s%> for you while you <S%H2790>keep<s%> <S%H2790>silent.<s%>"

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H4100>"Why<s%> are you <S%H6817>crying<s%> out to Me? <S%H1696>Tell<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5265>go<s%> <S%H5265>forward.<s%>

"And as for you, <S%H7311>lift<s%> up your <S%H4294>staff<s%> and <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> and <S%H1234>divide<s%> it, and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H935>through<s%> the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> on <S%H3004>dry<s%> <S%H3004>land.<s%>

"And as for Me, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H2388>harden<s%> the <S%H3820>hearts<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> so that they will <S%H935>go<s%> in <S%H310>after<s%> them; and I will be <S%H3513>honored<s%> through <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H2428>army,<s%> through his <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and his <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>

"Then the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> when I am <S%H3513>honored<s%> through <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> through his <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and his <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>"

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> who had been <S%H1980>going<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5265>moved<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H4480>behind<s%> <S%H310><s%> them; and the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5265>moved<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> them and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H4480>behind<s%> <S%H310><s%> them.

So it <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and there was the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> along with the <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> yet it <S%H215>gave<s%> <S%H215>light<s%> at <S%H3915>night.<s%> Thus the <S%H2088>one<s%> did not <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> the <S%H2088>other<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3915>night.<s%>

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1980>swept<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> [back] by a <S%H5794>strong<s%> <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H7760>turned<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> into <S%H2724>dry<s%> <S%H2724>land,<s%> so the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were <S%H1234>divided.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H935>through<s%> the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> on the <S%H3004>dry<s%> <S%H3004>land,<s%> and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> [were like] a <S%H2346>wall<s%> to them on their <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> and on their <S%H8040>left.<s%>

Then the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H7291>took<s%> up the <S%H7291>pursuit,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> Pharaoh's <S%H5483>horses,<s%> his <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and his <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> in <S%H310>after<s%> them into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about at the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H821>watch,<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8259>looked<s%> <S%H8259>down<s%> on the <S%H4264>army<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> through the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> and <S%H6051>cloud<s%> and <S%H2000>brought<s%> the <S%H4264>army<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> into <S%H2000>confusion.<s%>

And He caused their <S%H4818>chariot<s%> <S%H212>wheels<s%> to <S%H5493>swerve,<s%> and He made them <S%H5090>drive<s%> with <S%H3517>difficulty;<s%> so the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let us <S%H5127>flee<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H3898>fighting<s%> for them against the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>"

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H5186>"Stretch<s%> out your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> so that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> may <S%H7725>come<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> their <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and their <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>"

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to its <S%H386>normal<s%> <S%H386>state<s%> at <S%H1242>daybreak,<s%> while the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> were <S%H5127>fleeing<s%> <S%H7122>right<s%> into it; then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5287>overthrew<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

And the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> and <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and the <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> even Pharaoh's <S%H3605>entire<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%> that had <S%H935>gone<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them; not <S%H5704>even<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of them <S%H7604>remained.<s%>

But the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> on <S%H3004>dry<s%> <S%H3004>land<s%> through the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> [were like] a <S%H2346>wall<s%> to them on their <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> and on their <S%H8040>left.<s%>

Thus the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3467>saved<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H4191>dead<s%> on the <S%H3220>seashore.<s%> <S%H8193><s%>

And when <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3027>power<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6213>used<s%> against the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and they <S%H539>believed<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and in His <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
